snippet: The internet giant has spent years migrating the source of electric power at its giant data centers to sources like wind turbines and solar panels....
abstract: Google announces that in 2017 all of its data centers around globe will be fully powered by renewable energy sources, including wind farms and solar panels; shift is culmination of decade-long effort by internet giant to make large-scale deals with renewable producers, offering guarantee to buy their energy, which then helped those companies obtain financing to expand further.
lead_paragraph: The internet giant has spent years migrating the source of electric power at its giant data centers to sources like wind turbines and solar panels.

headline.main: Google Says It Will Run Entirely on Renewable Energy in 2017
headline.print_headline: Google Says Its Data Centers Will Run Entirely on Renewable Energy by 2017
